snippet: The free-agent wide receiver Emmanuel Sanders is sticking with Pittsburgh. The Steelers said they matched the $2.5 million offer the New England Patriots made to Sanders last week.
abstract: Free-agent wide receiver Emmanuel Sanders is sticking with Pittsburgh Steelers, after they match $2.5 million offer New England Patriots made to Sanders.
lead_paragraph: The free-agent wide receiver Emmanuel Sanders is sticking with Pittsburgh. The Steelers said they matched the $2.5 million offer the New England Patriots made to Sanders last week.

headline.seo: Receiver Emmanuel Sanders Staying With Steelers
